UPDATE t_ac_task_data SET sys_update_time = NOW(), is_delete = 1 where LENGTH(id_card) < 18 and is_delete = 0
UPDATE t_ac_task_data SET sys_update_time = NOW(), is_delete = 1 where age <= #{minAge} and age >= #{maxAge} and is_delete = 0
mapper.delete:
UPDATE t_ac_task_data SET sys_update_time = NOW(), is_delete = 1 where
is_delete = 0 and id not in ( select t.max_id from ( select max(id) as max_id from t_ac_task_data group by id_card) as t )
